    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> void setThriftClass(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, Class<T> klass)
      Call this method when setting up your Hadoop job if reading into a Thrift object that is not encoded into the parquet-serialized thrift metadata (for example, writing with Apache Thrift, but reading back into Twitter Scrooge version of the same thrift definition, or a different but compatible Apache Thrift class).
      static <T> void setThriftClass(org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConf conf, Class<T> klass)
      Call this method when setting up your Hadoop job if reading into a Thrift object that is not encoded into the parquet-serialized thrift metadata (for example, writing with Apache Thrift, but reading back into Twitter Scrooge version of the same thrift definition, or a different but compatible Apache Thrift class).

      • Methods inherited from class parquet.hadoop.ParquetInputFormat

        createRecordReader, getFooters, getFooters, getGlobalMetaData, getReadSupport, getReadSupportClass, getSplits, getSplits, getUnboundRecordFilter, listStatus, setReadSupportClass, setReadSupportClass, setUnboundRecordFilter
